I have resigned myself to Brexit, and all the hurt that will follow. For me now this how 'fair' this will be toward the ordinary person. Anyone with any sense knew coming out was all about immigration and refugees, I hope they are ready for everything else that people didnt think of twice when voting to happen. Dont let us become like America. We are our own people, though May gets confused. There is SO much hate in the world today, Yes Brexit will happen, but lets keep it British, Tolerant and kind. I just wish it wasnt a Tory government taking us out.
Andrew Ballenger just what I expect. Rude and childish remark
I am sorry, it won't be tolerant nor kind. The result of the referendum wasn't tolerant or kind to start with.
Francesca Daldello I agree. We live in such a facist, and hateful world, there is just no light at the end of the tunnel
no, I can't see any!

Wake up. The EU was falling apart right In front of us. So many people wanted to remain for personal reasons, becoming selfish. Deal with the problem now so your children don't have to deal with it later

Daniel Sanderson for me it's not about that. It's about how the majority will be treated by this vile government.  They have shown us time and time again they they only tolerate us. And with out someone keeping them in check it's going to get worse

I voted to leave the EU, not for immigration issues. Nor racist intent. I researched the Eu and found out things I did not agree with. I honestly feel that as a country pulling together we can do great things.. The EU is trying to make people of different heritage and history to work to a one size fits all scenario. we are expected to accept people who less than a century ago was trying to kill each other. The "EU" will one day come about but not in our lifetime.. there is too much work to do they need to decide on a common language and teach it in ALL infant schools for at least three generation before we can truly trust and work together. Only than can they start to work on other issues. They would need to find a way of balancing out the economies of each country so there was no incentive to flood a given area as has happened this time. They can then develop common methods of dealing with situations that arise in such a way that the people have a say in what is happening. This, as I say , will not happen in our lifetime
Richard James Dalton ..and when it does happen, that language is now unlikely to be English and the UK will be labelled as the country of quitters.  When the going gets tough the weak quit.

I am with you. Ignore the trolls. Thyy are mostly silly boys hiding behind the computer screesc bully people, particularly women because they are disenfranchised with their own lives and power hungry. Its common for people like that to lean towards fascism or communism. Alot of uneducates brits and educated brits leaned towards hitler in the 1930s but after the 2nd WW it became shameful to admit to knowing people like that. Now with the support of the misogynistic bigots putin farage and trump, they are all coming out of the woodwork. Not all brexit voters are uneducated but its the uneducated ones who come online telling everyone else to 'get a grip' or 'to wake up' or the loony left. They forget they are in the minority. Theybe cried out for sovriegnty and democracy but theybdont believe in that at all or they would discuss issues rather than just troll! 
Richard James Dalton thankyou for being one of the few brexit voters to behave decently and explain your views. You are right there have been lots of faults in the EU. They were so desperate to stop putin taking back eastern europe that they allowed them in when there was too big an economic gap between the east ans the west. But we were very strong and powerful in the eu with more say than anyone except the germans and french. We were equal to them. You cant fix something by leaving. Its going toncost billions in lawyers fees to undo all the laws and treaties that bind us together and to make new ones in which we will always be the weaker partner because we dont have the empire. We are just little England. In the end we will rejoin but the damage that is to be done to.the average brit is likely to be huge. Our universities, science and schools are already suffering. Insee it all needed fixing and I would have voted for that. Not to just blindly remain but instead we are now making friends with the worlds latest hitler. In Europe everyone was safe. Now women, minorities and the disabled are unsafe. How a country who fought so hard against hitler and fascism can turn so easily into everything it fought against. If farage and his billionaire friends have their way. The next 20 years at least will be very terrible!
Clare Binksy Webb what a truthful and educate answer, thank you!!  Seems us lefties very educated ;)
Im a centralist haha I believe in balance ☺
Clueless

I just wanna be here to see when the prices on markets raising. All the food The cost of the food and services. Yeah ,cause you know folks ,nothing is free .Someone needs to support the inflation that's coming. Hope that I'm wrong.

Sorry but 'victory' seems a tad bit inappropriate for a PM that was horse shoed into a role, forced to take a stance on a position she never supported. Farage, Gove and Boris won - parliament was never really going to go against the decision cast by the majority of the electorate, however slight. Country's still divided, no one knows what 'brexit' actually means and it looks like people are comfortable in allowing the Tories to have a blank cheque in this matter. It's a total shambles!
Depressing
No, it's a great foundation for a negotiating position.

Corbyn has the single market on Labour manifesto protect workers right/single market unfettered. Until after they trigger 50 only then will it be able to be killed in the 3 stage process before it comes law. May says no market , she walks into the Wall, by failing to meet the goals of the party's Brexit exit, it is not law until the three stages after the trigger. This is only how they propose to shape that bill. Take heart this bill will never make it into law Not without that single market! Ignore all they might. Cameron and May have dodged going through parliament for this reason. Brexit will be toast. So will Tory's! Wales Must Never allow herself to be placed in this position again.

Allowing Tories a blank cheque ? You been reading too much trashy news.. did you not know the EU has made it clear that there is no single market for UK for voted leave unless there is free movement .. do you know what that means ? Unemployment in Europe is rampant .. think about what impact of continual free movement will have on you ..

Our history books teach us that Britain defeated the Third Reich in the Second World War. It didn't. Germany's hunger for power and dominance in Europe took another guise in the form of the EU - an artificial marketplace for its goods with a manipulated single currency to benefit German exports and industrial base. But Germany was not happy with this alone - it wanted more political integration, a single army, arbitrary laws and centralised power. 

Today our MPs agreed with the Great British public to defy this flagrant authoritarianism. No longer would we sleep walk into an undemocratic federal super state which benefited its unelected overloads. 

Today we took back control for our own destiny. Today the great British people won.
Bla bla bla

The only good thing you have done in the last 40 years are the Sex Pistols, because their leader was Irish. Goodbye Britons, we will not miss you! Ps But I hope the Scottish will be soon part of the great european family...

I think this headline does not make sense. She hasn't won anything. It's been decided by the British people to leave EU and therefore their representatives must follow as they have been asked to do. What on earth is it a credit for May? She didn't want to do it in the first place. So stop giving dignity to May what she doesn't deserve. She is nothing but a selfish woman with a very little heart.
The future generations will live to suffer the consequences.

Corbyn has the single market on Labour manifesto protect workers right/single market unfettered. Until after they trigger 50 only then will it be able to be killed in the 3 stage process before it comes law. May says no market , she walks into the Wall, by failing to meet the goals of the party's Brexit exit, it is not law until the three stages after the trigger. This is only how they propose to shape that bill. Take heart this bill will never make it into law Not without that single market! Ignore all they might. Cameron and May have dodged going through parliament for this reason. Brexit will be toast. So will Tory's! Wales Must Never allow herself to be placed in this position again.

Brexit referendum vote was not a landslide but a few percentage more. Meaning at least 45+ % of British people did not want Brexit.  If so,  how is the MP vote so lopsided ? How is it so land slide? Are MPs not representing the people ?

GO BREXIT !!! GO AHEAD UK !!!!
The European Union is dead. There has never been, just treaties and regulations distant from real needs and aspiration of the people. Those who persist in this path, bankruptcy does not lead anywhere, or is a "dreamer" (that soon will wake up), or a colluding with the system (from which it receives money and power). The good world, globalist and solidarity has failed, because when people touch the money and earned well-being, does not intend to give it up. And anyway, that the European project there is clear and conspicuous ..... We hate within the same nation, let alone what we can think of others. ha ha ha ha !!!!
This is madness little Britain 😒

Be positive moving forward. Put your negativity aside. If this isn't achieved risk becoming what it is you hate.
